TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract ICallbackEventHandler

summary.span: 用于指示控件可以作为服务器上的回调事件的目标。

span.span: Used to indicate that a control can be the target of a callback event on the server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 为需要接收回叫事件的任何自定义控件实现 接口。Implement the interface for any custom control that needs to receive callback events. 有关详细信息，请参阅[实现无回发的客户端回调](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dfaaa7d4-e1f2-4322-b2f5-796e0419f185)。For more information, see [Implementing Client Callbacks Without Postbacks](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dfaaa7d4-e1f2-4322-b2f5-796e0419f185). 实现 接口的控件的示例包括 、和 控件。Examples of controls that implement the interface include the , , and controls. 当回调事件面向实现 接口的控件时，将调用 方法来处理事件，并将事件自变量作为参数传递，并且 方法返回回调的结果。When a callback event targets a control that implements the interface, the method is called to handle the event, passing the event argument as a parameter and the method returns the result of the callback. 在回调过程中从数据源控件检索数据的控件可以同步或异步执行此操作。Controls that retrieve data from a data source control during callback can do so synchronously or asynchronously. ASP.NET 控件，如 、和 都同步实现。ASP.NET controls like , , and are implemented synchronously. 同步回调不会阻止用户在浏览器中工作。Synchronous callbacks do not prevent the user from working in the browser. 在同步模式下，一次只能执行一个回调，并优先处理最后一个回调。In synchronous mode, only one callback at a time can execute, with the last callback taking precedence. 实现 Web 控件以支持异步行为时，可以同时引发多个回调。When a Web control is implemented to support asynchronous behavior, multiple callbacks can be raised simultaneously. 有关异步编程的详细信息，请参阅[基于事件的异步模式（EAP）](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/event-based-asynchronous-pattern-eap.md)。For details on asynchronous programming, see [Event-based Asynchronous Pattern (EAP)](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/event-based-asynchronous-pattern-eap.md). 您可以指定是否验证源自实现 接口的控件所呈现的用户界面的回调事件。You can specify whether callback events originating from the user interface rendered by a control implementing the interface are validated. 事件验证是一种很好的安全做法。Validation of events is a good security practice. 但出于性能原因，你可以禁用它。However, for performance reasons you can disable it. 若要控制是否对回调事件执行事件验证，请设置[@ Page](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ydy4x04a(v=vs.100))指令的 `enableEventValidation` 属性或 web.config 文件的[pages 元素（ASP.NET 设置架构）](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/950xf363(v=vs.100))的 `enableEventValidation` 属性。To control whether event validation is performed on callback events, set the `enableEventValidation` attribute of the [@ Page](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ydy4x04a(v=vs.100)) directive or the `enableEventValidation` attribute of the [pages Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/950xf363(v=vs.100)) of the Web.config file. 如果在代码中设置 属性，请在 "页面处理" 的 "`Page_Init`" 阶段设置该属性。If you set the property in code, set it in the `Page_Init` phase of page processing. 若要详细了解事件验证的安全优势及其性能成本，请参阅[ASP.NET 性能概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/cc668225(v=vs.100))。For more information on balancing the security benefit of event validation with its performance cost, see [ASP.NET Performance Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/cc668225(v=vs.100)).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance string GetCallbackResult() cil managed

summary.span: 返回以控件为目标的回调事件的结果。

span.span: Returns the results of a callback event that targets a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中引发的异常不会阻止调用 并返回结果。Exceptions thrown in will not prevent from being called and returning a result. 若要防止 返回结果，请在 中引发异常时设置标志，并从 返回空字符串。To prevent from returning a result, set a flag when an exception is thrown in and return an empty string from .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void RaiseCallbackEvent(string eventArgument) cil managed

param.name: eventArgument
param.span: 一个字符串，表示要传递到事件处理程序的事件参数。

span.span: A string that represents an event argument to pass to the event handler.

summary.span: 处理以控件为目标的回调事件。

span.span: Processes a callback event that targets a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 `null` 用作事件参数参数时，字符串将被序列化为 "null" 并发送回服务器。When `null` is used as the event argument parameter, the string is serialized to "null" and sent back to the server. 由于没有办法区分 `null` 和 "null"，因此应避免将 `null` 参数参数用于回调。Because there is no way to distinguish between `null` and "null", you should avoid using `null` argument parameters with callbacks. 中引发的异常不会阻止调用 并返回结果。Exceptions thrown in will not prevent from being called and returning a result. 若要防止 返回结果，请在 中引发异常时设置标志，并从 返回空字符串。To prevent from returning a result, set a flag when an exception is thrown in and return an empty string from .
